rComments: This isn't an easy A if you're not a native speaker or haven't had any experience beyond Chinese courses (If you're a native speaker, I don't recommend taking 3-6).  It's not ridiculously hard, but it's not an easy A. Lots of memorization, of course.
A perfect class to get an A, but expect to learn anything from his class. However, he is very very nice, just go to class and do the works, you will get an A for sure.

Guo Laoshi is a nice guy but honestly... he can't teach!!! He drones on about cultural problems in China and doesn't properly review the material for the students. The book is crap, I felt like I was learning out of a dictionary only worse because the books provided don't tell you if the vocab words are nouns, verbs, etc. Gives almost no hw but the
